values.name: 3x3Links
values.value: {"_id":"3x3Links","title":"Speed Dial Homepage","desc":"3x3Links is a minimalist, shareable internet start page. Especially teachers use it a lot.\n\nVery simliar to the original speed dial browser start page invented by Opera, 3x3Links features additional to use your homepage accross different browser, customize the link logos and the ability to group links into folders.","dateCreated":"2008-09-08T22:00:00.000Z","isProd":true,"urlProd":"http://www.3x3links.com","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T10:01:04.484Z","icon":"icon-th","devStatus":"Paused","platform":"WebApp","imgDemo":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/3x3links/3x3links1.png","screenshots":[{"title":"Homepage","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/3x3links/3x3links2.png","$$hashKey":"023","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T10:01:03.612Z","active":false,"desc":"All your links in one place. In this case there are 9 topic related folders on the first level."},{"title":"Folders","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/3x3links/3x3links3.png","$$hashKey":"02G","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T10:01:03.613Z","active":true,"desc":"Inside the Shopping folder, there are all related links and even subfolders for subtopics."},{"title":"Editor","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/3x3links/3x3links4.png","$$hashKey":"02O","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T10:01:03.613Z","active":false,"desc":"With one click you can edit, update or delete your links or folders. 3x3Links will automatically try to find fitting logos for your links."},{"title":"Options: Personal links","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/3x3links/3x3links5.png","$$hashKey":"02W","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T10:01:03.614Z","active":false,"desc":"Since 3x3Pages were designed to share, there are multiple options to share or embed your page."},{"title":"Options: Customization","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/3x3links/3x3links6.png","$$hashKey":"034","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T10:01:03.615Z","active":false,"desc":"You can change the layout, colors and background of your 3x3Page and even add custom copyright informations."}],"role":"Owner","emailSupport":"info@3x3links.com","urlBlog":"http://3x3links.blogspot.de/","socGooglePlus":"https://plus.google.com/109422025658748081793/posts","socTwitter":"3x3links","urlGoogleApp":"3x3links.com","twitterID":"3x3links","urlGPlus":"https://plus.google.com/109422025658748081793/posts","urlDemo":"https://3x3links.appspot.com/demo","iDescTrunc":50,"tags":["AppEngine","Python","jQueryUI"],"features":[{"title":"Group values.name: ExKino
values.value:
{"_id":"ExKino","isProd":true,"urlProd":"http://www.exkino.de","title":"Now for Movies","icon":"icon-film","desc":"ExKino - which translates in movies which already left the cinema and are now available as online stream to rent.
ExKino checks daily for new releases on Google Play and posts those into your personal movie inbox.
Decide which movies interests you and share those with your friends.

ExKino is available in German only.","dateCreated":"2012-12-31T23:00:00.000Z","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T14:52:56.934Z","devStatus":"Paused","platform":"WebApp","screenshots":[{"title":"Categories","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/exkino/exkino2.png","$$hashKey":"02L","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T14:52:54.847Z","desc":"Exkino wants you to sort all incoming movies into "Watch", "Liked" and "Disliked" lists.","active":true},{"title":"Incomming folder","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/exkino/exkino3.png","$$hashKey":"02Y","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T14:52:54.848Z","desc":"All new movies are introduced with ratings, a brief description, links to additional resources and a trailer search feature.","active":false},{"title":"Watch list","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/exkino/exkino4.png","$$hashKey":"036","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T14:52:54.849Z","desc":"All the movies you like to watch are presented in one tab. Click on the title to see more details. Tag movies which are your favourite, you already own or you would watch again.","active":false},{"title":"Movie night","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/exkino/exkino5.png","$$hashKey":"03E","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T14:52:54.849Z","desc":"If you friends do also use ExKino, you can sync your watch list to generate movie suggestions for your next movie night.","active":false},{"title":"On the fly sync","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/exkino/exkino6.png","$$hashKey":"03M","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T14:52:54.850Z","desc":"ExKino can also sync your movie list with a simple pin code feature. values.name: Match 3 Worlds
values.value:
{"_id":"Match 3 Worlds","devStatus":"Completed","role":"Owner","isPrivate":false,"urlGPlus":"https://plus.google.com/107993409891269188110/posts","isProd":true,"dateCreated":"2012-03-26T22:00:00.000Z","urlProd":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/match-3-worlds-v01/kjgkmlihiafpibdhdmagdbkghdioajig/details?hl=en","platform":"WebApp","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T09:59:42.481Z","tags":["jQueryUI","Game"],"desc":"This is a Match 3 game in progress.

This is a Match 3 game in progress. Choose a world to play inspired by famous 8bit games. Try to level-up. Earn trophies. Give feedback on Google+.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Fast processor
- Big screen
- Sorry, this is still in development

HOW TO PLAY
- Drag and drop one block to switch position with a neighbor
- Three blocks of the same type will explode
- Try to create chains of explosions to multiple the points earned
- You can always stop chain reactions by switching other blocks, however, the multipliers will be reset.
- In higher levels, try to make trophies fall to the ground to earn those

Any idea for further enhancements? Visit us on Google+:
https://plus.google.com/107993409891269188110/posts

COPYRIGHT NOTICE
This is a non-commercial fan project.
All spites used are property of Nintendo, Capcom, Mojang & other companies. We love those games and want to put them back in your memory so you will buy them and the companies will be able to produce sequels!","icon":"icon-gamepad","iDescTrunc":50,"ssID":"match38bit","screenshots":[{"title":"Main menu","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/match3worlds/match1.png","$$hashKey":"0X3","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T09:59:41.406Z","desc":"Select your level and view your trophies.","active":true},{"title":"In game.","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/match3worlds/match2.png","$$hashKey":"0XG","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T09:59:41.406Z","desc":"Match three or more tiles to make them disappear. Make the special items fall to the groud to collect them.","active":false},{"title":"Different layouts","url":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/match3worlds/match3.png","$$hashKey":"0XO","dateUpdated":"2013-05-21T09:59:41.406Z","desc":"Match 3 Worlds supported different tiles which were taken over from famous 8-bit games.","active":false}],"imgDemo":"http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/appcase/match3worlds/match2.png"}
